attributes.additional_details:
Police reject report which may pinpoint the body of moors murder victim Keith Bennett,

a top forensic archaeologist's report that could pinpoint where Keith is buried has been rejected by police,
Peter Masters, of the Centre for Archaeological and Forensic Analysis, "said it was possible clandestine burials exists at this location"
But assistant Chief Constable Steven Heywood said in a letter to campaigners "no dig or search will take place"
We need our government to step in and insist they action the dig if not then I'm sure our armed forces would be happy to help!
